attributes.action: Election manifesto,s should be honoured or goverment can be kicked out.
attributes.additional_details: Elected parties are voted in based on what was promised in their manifesto.They very often don't honoure these policy's .The party in office should be held to account and removed from office.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Declare government legislation unlawful if not included in party manifesto

Created by: David Brown

Closing 02/01/2015
